channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC MV400 family
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC MV400 family

item.title: CVE-2020-25241|2024-08-04T15:33:05.467Z -- siemens -- simatic%20mv400%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC MV400 family (All Versions < V7.0.6). The underlying TCP stack of the affected products does not correctly validate the sequence number for incoming TCP RST packages. An attacker could exploit this to terminate arbitrary TCP sessions.
